articles.title: Over 30 smallcaps log double-digit rise as Sensex posts fourth straight weekly gain; Tata Group stocks among gainers | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Underperformance continued in broader markets last week as midcap remained in range, while smallcaps shed three per cent. Tata Group stocks- Tata Investment and Tata Chemicals were among the gainers on the S&P BSE Smallcap index.

articles.title: Banks association, employee unions sign pact for Saturday as public holiday - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Indian Banks' Association and bank employee unions reach a consensus to offer several benefits to PSU bank employees.
